prompt.expectations: I want chat GPT to give suggestion about study materials, as an example I asked to provide link to the materials about API testing.
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments: I am happy with the provided answer as I could reach out to the material directly without spending time to google them or looking through any other resource.

assessment.comments: Good for providing pointers about where to start.

2.revisedPrompt: Act as a senior software development engineer in test, provide materials about api testing
2.changeLog: Added more context to the prompt.
